reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ♾️/⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Spice: 🌶️🌶️🌶️.5I shouldn’t have have waited so long to read this. I’ve been blown away and I am okay with that.I’ll be very honest, I was looking for a super smutty filled book with a good plot of course.. This was so much more than that. I have 𝑵𝑬𝑽𝑬𝑹 laughed so much reading a book. Like seriously amazing!Romeo and Dallas were absolutely 𝑯𝑶𝑻 for each other! 🍆💦🔥🥵How could I not fall for Dallas Townsend! She so angelic!"𝒀𝒐𝒖'𝒓𝒆 𝒈𝒐𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒕𝒐 𝒃𝒆 𝒎𝒚 𝒇𝒂𝒗𝒐𝒓𝒊𝒕𝒆 𝒎𝒊𝒔𝒕𝒂𝒌𝒆."I absolutely loved the banter from the word go. I laughed alot in this book. The quick comebacks had me rolling. I loved how the enemies to lovers transpired to 𝑺𝑷𝑰𝑪𝑬.. 𝑮𝒐𝒐𝒅 𝑳𝒐𝒓𝒅 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝑺𝑷𝑰𝑪𝑬! 𝑰𝒕 𝒘𝒂𝒔 𝑺𝑷𝑰𝑪𝑰𝑵𝑮!! 🥵🔥I honestly got so wrapped up into this book from the beginning and was up until 4am… I never once looked at a clock! 😂"𝑶𝒍𝒍𝒊𝒆 𝒗𝑩: 𝑫𝒊𝒅 𝒔𝒉𝒆 𝒃𝒓𝒆𝒂𝒌 𝒚𝒐𝒖 𝒚𝒆𝒕?""𝚁𝚘𝚖𝚎𝚘 𝙲𝚘𝚜𝚝𝚊: 𝙲𝚘𝚗𝚜𝚒𝚍𝚎𝚛 𝚖𝚎 𝚞𝚗𝚋𝚛𝚎𝚊𝚔𝚊𝚋𝚕𝚎."This is a slow burn love, but the love lingers throughout, leaving you constantly needing to read more!𝒀𝒐𝒖'𝒓𝒆 𝒎𝒚 𝒇𝒂𝒗𝒐𝒓𝒊𝒕𝒆 𝒑𝒍𝒐𝒕 𝒕𝒘𝒊𝒔𝒕."The characters all play an important role and the details are perfect! The book is written well and holds your interest throughout!I will 𝑭𝑶𝑹𝑬𝑽𝑬𝑹 recommend this book to anyone and everyone to read! It’s absolutely 𝑷𝑬𝑹𝑭𝑬𝑪𝑻 and holds a very special place in my 𝑯𝑬𝑨𝑹𝑻! ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: “𝐈 𝐰𝐢𝐥𝐥 𝐧𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝐥𝐨𝐯𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮, 𝐃𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐚𝐬 𝐂𝐨𝐬𝐭𝐚. 𝐅𝐨𝐫 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐭, 𝐈 𝐚𝐦 𝐭𝐫𝐮𝐥𝐲 𝐬𝐨𝐫𝐫𝐲. 𝐁𝐞𝐜𝐚𝐮𝐬𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐜𝐞𝐫𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐥𝐲 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐡𝐲 𝐨𝐟 𝐥𝐨𝐯𝐞.““𝐈’𝐦 𝐢𝐧 𝐥𝐨𝐯𝐞 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐲𝐨𝐮, 𝐃𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐚𝐬 𝐂𝐨𝐬𝐭𝐚. 𝐈 𝐥𝐨𝐯𝐞 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐩𝐢𝐞𝐜𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐲𝐨𝐮. 𝐄𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐜𝐞𝐥𝐥. 𝐄𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐛𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐡. 𝐄𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐥𝐚𝐮𝐠𝐡. 𝐘𝐨𝐮’𝐯𝐞 𝐛𝐞𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐜𝐡𝐞𝐝 𝐦𝐞, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐈 𝐝𝐨𝐧’𝐭 𝐰𝐚𝐧𝐭 𝐭𝐨 𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐯𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐝 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐧𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐝𝐨𝐧’𝐭 𝐤𝐧𝐨𝐰 𝐡𝐨𝐰 𝐦𝐮𝐜𝐡 𝐲𝐨𝐮’𝐯𝐞 𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐞𝐝 𝐦𝐞.“Contrary to many, I actually thoroughly enjoyed this book.I will admit certain parts had me placing my kindle face down and screaming into my palms, BUT it kept me entertained!My Dark Romeo elicited a plethora of emotions from me. I cried. I screamed. I had to take a breather multiple times. I was frustrated. I was THERE.Dallas was quite frustrating but we have to give her a break. I mean she didn’t have much choice in the beginning!However, her still causing fusses and being unreasonable AFTER Romeo gave her the option to LEAVE was incredibly infuriating.Nonetheless, I adored the way Dallas and Romeos story unfolded.“𝐘𝐨𝐮’𝐫𝐞 𝐦𝐲 𝐟𝐚𝐯𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐩𝐥𝐨𝐭 𝐭𝐰𝐢𝐬𝐭.“^ Yet another beautiful quote from this book.My husband and I actually use a similar quote for our relationship — “You’re my favorite risk.”Seeing this small quote pulled at my heart strings. THIS ENTIRE BOOK pulled at my heart strings.Solid 4 star read and would recommend to fellow book lovers!⭐️My one and only complaint is…..*cough cough*the underwear scenesI’m not judging! I was just a little confused!🤣

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I started this book expecting the usual mafia style romance. What I discovered was the antics of the not-as-crazy-as-she-appears Dallas and the cold Romeo Costa, the man who becomes her husband through a bit of social manipulation (literally being caught with his hand in her pants). Two stories run in parallel: Romeo's revenge against his father and his desire to break the wild child Dallas for no other reason than association with a rival and that she fits his father's superficial template of the perfect wife. Dallas' antics escalate as Romeo tries to use intimidation and head games to bend her to his will, and I enjoyed more than a few belly laughs at the craziness of it all. However, there is also a serious side with death threats and betrayal that add the bit of grounding needed in the story. The characters could be a bit farfetched at times, but the personalities needed to match their actions. Simply did not expect the book to be as funny as it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: SPOILER FREE REVIEWThis book was pretty good, I liked Romeo's character and the way he was written a lot. I didn't like the main character very much, though, which knocked this book's rating down. She's not very interesting, and quite annoying at times. It's rare that I read a book and not like the character whose perspective the book is written from. I feel like Romeo was extremely well written and the small changes in his demeanor leading up to the end of the book are subtle but easy to pick up on towards the end of the book. I liked Romeo's friends a lot and the way he's more relaxed with them throughout the book. I did, however, find the basic plot of the story to be just that- basic. A rude rich guy marries a hot, but annoying woman because of his enemy and then falls in love with her. A lot of books are written with this basic plot, but they add to it, making it more interesting and less cliche. Take King of Wrath, same basic storyline, but the author added so much to both main characters that the book was impossible to put down. I think the author of this book was so focused on Romeo's character that she forgot about the main character. She simply made the main annoying, with no depth. She's like a beautiful pool that looks full of promise, then you try to jump in and it's only a few inches deep. Also, the smut is awful. It's poorly written, and downright weird in some chapters. I don't usually read much of it anyway, I usually just skip, but I noticed that some of the scenes the author wrote are just weird and grossed me out.I think the author could do so much with this book if she added more depth to the main and the plot, and took out some of the poorly written inappropriate scenes.

reviews.reviewerName: Lana's Broom Closet\Witches BrewLana's Broom Closet\Witches Brew
reviews.reviewText: Came super fast intact and great shape.This book was incredible. I absolutely loved it. I finished reading it last night. I highly recommend. I give it a five star reaf in a four star for spice.

reviews.reviewTitle: Dark Romance , Arrange Marriage and Sassy Amazing Heroine
reviews.reviewText: Obsessed with this story, in love with this couple and there are some steamy moments that will linger in my mind for a while!My Dark Romeo written by Parker S Huntington and LJ Shen starts with a debutante ball in a small town in Georgia in which Dark, Powerful and Larger than Life Romeo catches the attention of everyone, everyone's except for Dallas'. Dallas is more focused on the sweet treats (English Shortbread) in Romeo's table which peaks Romeo's interest in this wild creature. Romeo offers Dallas a quick escape, an adventure before she has to fulfill her commitment with her selected fiance Madison. What starts as a fling ends up being Dallas' worst nightmare as she gets caught and is treated as damaged goods being promised to Romeo, a husband she doesn't want and is shipped to DC, away from her family and her friends. Would cold Romeo warm to sweet, smart Dallas or will Dallas wilt under Romeo's care?My Dark Romeo is definitely one of my Top Readings of 2023: we have a marriage of convenience (or inconvenience due to its rough start) between a dark, broody and secretive Hero looking for revenge and a sassy, super smart and even vengeful heroine that will stop at nothing until she gets more than Romeo's attention. Not only everything she does to catch it, but Romeo's reaction to her actions are definitely super fun to read. Romeo was a Hero like no other, his inner conflict was amazing. Dallas stole my heart! Also there are some amazing side characters that definitely need their own story. I can't wait for what these two authors have prepared for us, this literary world is ready to shake us all readers.What to Expect:Dark RomanceMarriage of Convenience (or Inconvenience? Lol!)Vengeful HeroSassy and Super Smart HeroineAmazing Side Characters (we need their story asap)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What can I say !Romeo Costa makes you want to punch him but swoon over him at the same time !Dallas is fierce , sassy and a downright babe ! She’s one of the best FMC I have read in a long time.The storyline is awesome, it makes you want to read more and find out what happens with all the drama that goes on. You want them to fall in love and have the HEA from early on in the book which makes reading enjoyable.5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
The plot is filled with hilarious quips and a roller coaster ride of conflicting emotions. Loved the final outcome of the plot. Eagerly waiting for the next issues in this series..
